title: More wet weather: BoM spring forecast predicts rain for eastern half of Australia
summary: Record ocean heat is expected to enhance the severity of storms, posing greater risks to coastal areas. Additionally, increased cloud cover is projected to keep nighttime temperatures above average across nearly the entire country. These climate changes highlight the ongoing challenges of global warming.
